title: Make it stop! How to handle that one streaming ad playing on repeat.
description: This is why you're haunted by that one ad again and again on YouTube, Hulu or Tubi TV.

title: The ‘red team’ race to make AI go rogue
description: Tech firms know their chatbots can be biased, deceptive or even dangerous. They're paying hackers to figure out exactly how.

title: Zoom, a champion of remote work, calls employees back to office
description: With its new mandate, Zoom joins a number of other companies in signaling a decline in appetite for the fully remote work many employees had come to prefer.
